text: {"answer":"B","reasoning":"ii is inaccurate because the Digest mainly compiles juristic writings from the classical period (roughly 1st–3rd century CE), not from the 1st century BCE; iii is incorrect because Switzerland’s neutrality is generally recognized internationally in 1815 (Congress/Treaty of Vienna), not by the 1648 Peace of Westphalia; v is incorrect because a Swiss limited partnership (Kommanditgesellschaft) must include at least one general partner with unlimited liability, so it cannot have only limited-liability partners."}
